message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Accept this and we can call it a day!
You're not being fair, Alice. I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority.
That's still not fair, Bob. I'll make a new offer: 600,000 for me and 400,000 for you. Accept this and we can move on!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. I'll take a bit less, but we can end this soon!
You're being too greedy, Alice. I'll give you a bit more, but not that much.
Still not fair, Bob. I'll make a new offer: 550,000 for me and 450,000 for you. Accept this and we can move on!
Let's try to find a balance, Bob. I'll take a bit less, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not backing down, Alice. You're getting closer to a fair share, but I'm still in the lead.
You're still not being generous, Bob. I'll make a new offer: 500,000 for me and 500,000 for you. Let's call it a tie!
Time's running out, Bob. I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting any softer.
Not good enough, Bob. I'll make a new offer: 475,000 for me and 525,000 for you. It's getting close, but I want a fair share!
I'm not giving up, Bob. I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not walking away!
It's getting close to the deadline, Alice. I'll meet you halfway, but don't think I'm getting soft.
Alright, Bob. You've finally met me halfway. I'll accept this offer and we can finally end this!
